examplePhrases: Alexa ask Juke Box to play channel
Alexa ask Juke Box to play station
en-US.name: Juke Box
en-US.summary: Alexa Skill that uses the 'www' JSON API to query URLs for audio streams from custom playlists that are managed through a web interface. Uses the AudioPlayer interface.
en-US.description: Alexa Skill that uses the 'www' JSON API to query URLs for audio streams from custom playlists that are managed through a web interface. Uses the AudioPlayer interface.
